```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```

### Cleaning Population Data

```{r}
pop_df = 
read.csv("./total pop.csv")

pop_tidy = 
  pop_df[-1, ] %>% 
  janitor::clean_names() %>% 
  rename(population = p001001) %>% 
  select(geo_id, population) %>% 
  mutate(zip_code = gsub(".*US", '', geo_id))

```
